content.html: Dear employer, Help! I just did some mindfulness meditation as per your recent email, but my workload is now even worse – none of the work went away and I have even less time to do it in. What did I do wrong? Best regards, Kirsty
content.value:
Dear employer,

Help! I just did some mindfulness meditation as per your recent email, but my workload is now even worse – none of the work went away and I have even less time to do it in. What did I do wrong?

Best regards,

Kirsty
